full_summary:
### Offshore Patrol Vessel Charter
#### Tender Number: PW-23-01030316
#### Amendment Number: 4
#### Solicitation Number: 30004056A
#### Date Published: March 17, 2023
#### Tender Closing Date: April 11, 2023, at 13:00:00

**Project Background:**
The Government of Canada is seeking to charter an offshore patrol vessel for the purpose of conducting and facilitating fisheries compliance and monitoring activities within the North Pacific Ocean. The vessel will be required to operate in a vast area, including the northwestern and central Pacific Ocean, to facilitate boarding and inspection activities of industrial fishing vessels.

**Project Scope:**
The contract will run from the date of contract award to March 31, 2024, with options to renew for two additional one-year periods, subject to the discretion of Fisheries and Oceans Canada. The vessel will be used to conduct monitoring and compliance activities of foreign-flagged fishing vessels on the high seas, in accordance with Canadian fisheries legislation and international fisheries treaties.

**Key Deliverables:**
* Conduct boarding and inspection activities on industrial fishing vessels
* Operate in a vast area of the North Pacific Ocean, including the northwestern and central Pacific Ocean
* Facilitate scientific water sampling
* Deploy remotely-piloted aircraft systems (RPAS) to conduct monitoring of fisheries activities

**Charter Requirements:**
* The vessel must be capable of operating in a harsh marine environment
* The vessel must meet the necessary safety and security standards
* The vessel must have the necessary crew and equipment to facilitate boarding and inspection activities

**Contact Information:**
For more information, please contact:
Plante, Karine
Email: [DFOtenders-soumissionsMPO@dfo-mpo.gc.ca](mailto:DFOtenders-soumissionsMPO@dfo-mpo.gc.ca)
Address: 301 Bishop Drive, Fredericton, NB E3C 2M6, Canada

**Documents:**
The tender package can be downloaded from [Canada Buys](https://canadabuys.canada.ca) using the Solicitation Number 30004056A.
